original_text: Manasseh did not drive out the inhabitants of Beth-shean and its villages, or Taanach and its villages, or the inhabitants of Dor and its villages, or the inhabitants of Ibleam and its villages, or the inhabitants of Megiddo and its villages, for the Canaanites persisted in dwelling in that land.
korean_text: 므낫세가 벧스안과 그에 딸린 마을들의 주민과 다아낙과 그에 딸린 마을들의 주민과 돌과 그에 딸린 마을들의 주민과 이블르암과 그에 딸린 마을들의 주민과 므깃도와 그에 딸린 마을들의 주민들을 쫓아내지 못하매 가나안 족속이 결심하고 그 땅에 거주하였더니

sentences.original_text: Manasseh did not drive out the inhabitants of Beth-shean
or the inhabitants of Dor and its villages
or the inhabitants of Ibleam and its villages
or the inhabitants of Megiddo and its villages
for the Canaanites persisted in dwelling in that land
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 가나안 사람들이 그 땅에 계속 거주했기 때문이다
